ques_body: Do you have little interest or pleasure in doing things?
Are you feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?
Do you have trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
Are you feeling tired or having the little energy?
Do you have poor appetite or overeating?
Are you feeling bad about yourself?
Do you have trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching TV?
Do you move or speak so slowly that other people could have noticed?
Are you having thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way?
